entry.title: 人生长恨水长东
entry.content:
#打卡今年读完的一本书，王安忆的《长恨歌》#
今天开始，用git写自己的小博客。在reading list这个tag里面，记录的就是自己读过的书。

entry.title: Hello All
entry.content:
Starting from today, I hope that I can keep this blog alive.
I am going to post the following things:

  1. Statistic
    – statistical models
    – statistical concepts
  2. Computing science
    – computing science skills
    – computing science algorithms
  3. reading list
    – Some reviews and comments about the books I read.
